title: Pollution Pt 1: The Sticky Side of Teflon
description: In the first of a two-part series on pollution, Kate and Luigi discuss the health hazards and economic costs of air pollution and contaminated drinking water from the toxic chemical PFOA (C8) found in Teflon. How did DuPont skirt regulation and avoid corporate responsibility for so long?
author: uchicagopodcasts@gmail.com (Chicago Booth Review)
